EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering! Please see event details below.
Date & Time: Tuesday, July 12th, 9:00 AM—3:30 PM Location: Parkhotel, Filderbahnstraße 2, 70771 Leinfelden-Echterdingen

Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/events]]>.
